# Hosts

host minecraft:stone
tileType stone
texture minecraft:blocks/stone

host minecraft:stone:1
tileType stone
texture minecraft:blocks/stone_granite

host minecraft:stone:3
tileType stone
texture minecraft:blocks/stone_diorite

host minecraft:stone:5
tileType stone
texture minecraft:blocks/stone_andesite

host minecraft:dirt
tileType ground
hardness 0.5
texture minecraft:blocks/dirt

host minecraft:dirt:1
tileType ground
hardness 0.5
texture minecraft:blocks/coarse_dirt

# Strata ores cannot fall which makes sand and gravel weird as hosts
host minecraft:sand
tileType sand
hardness 0.5
texture minecraft:blocks/sand

host minecraft:sand:1
tileType sand
hardness 0.5
texture minecraft:blocks/red_sand

host minecraft:gravel
tileType gravel
hardness 0.6
texture minecraft:blocks/gravel

host minecraft:sandstone
tileType stone
hardness 0.8
texture minecraft:blocks/sandstone_normal
textureUp minecraft:blocks/sandstone_top
textureDown minecraft:blocks/sandstone_bottom

host minecraft:clay
tileType ground
hardness 0.6
texture minecraft:blocks/clay

host minecraft:hardened_clay
tileType stone
hardness 1.25
texture minecraft:blocks/hardened_clay

host minecraft:netherrack
tileType stone
hardness 0.4
texture minecraft:blocks/netherrack

host minecraft:soul_sand
tileType sand
hardness 0.5
texture minecraft:blocks/soul_sand

host minecraft:end_stone
tileType stone
hardness 3.0
texture minecraft:blocks/end_stone

host minecraft:stained_hardened_clay
tileType stone
hardness 1.25
resistance 7.0
texture minecraft:blocks/hardened_clay_stained_white

host minecraft:stained_hardened_clay:1
tileType stone
hardness 1.25
resistance 7.0
texture minecraft:blocks/hardened_clay_stained_orange

host minecraft:red_sandstone
tileType stone
hardness 0.8
texture minecraft:blocks/red_sandstone_normal
textureUp minecraft:blocks/red_sandstone_top
textureDown minecraft:blocks/red_sandstone_bottom

# Ores

ore coal
oreDict oreCoal -
tileType stone
burnTime 1600
texture strata:blocks/ore/vanilla/coal
oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/vanilla/coal normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
blockState strata:proto_cube_y_overlay
convertsTo minecraft:coal
proxyOre minecraft:coal_ore

ore diamond
oreDict oreDiamond gemDiamond
tileType stone
texture strata:blocks/ore/vanilla/diamond
oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/vanilla/diamond normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
blockState strata:proto_cube_y_overlay
convertsTo minecraft:diamond
proxyOre minecraft:diamond_ore

ore emerald
oreDict oreEmerald gemEmerald
tileType stone
texture strata:blocks/ore/vanilla/emerald
oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/vanilla/emerald normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
blockState strata:proto_cube_y_overlay
convertsTo minecraft:emerald
proxyOre minecraft:emerald_ore

ore gold
oreDict oreGold
tileType stone
texture strata:blocks/ore/vanilla/gold
oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/vanilla/gold normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
blockState strata:proto_cube_y_overlay
convertsTo minecraft:gold_ore
proxyOre minecraft:gold_ore

ore iron
oreDict oreIron
tileType stone
texture strata:blocks/ore/vanilla/iron
oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/vanilla/iron normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
blockState strata:proto_cube_y_overlay
convertsTo minecraft:iron_ore
proxyOre minecraft:iron_ore

ore lapis
oreDict oreLapis gemLapis
tileType stone
texture strata:blocks/ore/vanilla/lapis
oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/vanilla/lapis normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
blockState strata:proto_cube_y_overlay
convertsTo minecraft:dye:4
proxyOre minecraft:lapis_ore

ore redstone
oreDict oreRedstone dustRedstone
tileType stone
texture strata:blocks/ore/vanilla/redstone
oreItemTexture strata:items/ore/mask erase 100 strata:items/ore/border normal 100 strata:blocks/ore/vanilla/redstone normal 100 strata:items/ore/base
blockState strata:proto_cube_y_overlay
convertsTo minecraft:redstone
proxyOre minecraft:redstone_ore
activatable
